statements: SELECT * FROM food_expiration_monitoring;
SELECT food_name, expiration_date FROM food_expiration_monitoring WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT food_id, food_name, expiration_date, storage_location FROM food_expiration_monitoring ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT food_name, quantity FROM food_expiration_monitoring WHERE storage_location = 'Pantry';
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity FROM food_expiration_monitoring;
SELECT * FROM food_expiration_monitoring WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT food_id, food_name, quantity FROM food_expiration_monitoring WHERE storage_location = 'Pantry' ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT food_id, food_name, expiration_date FROM food_expiration_monitoring WHERE quantity > 10 AND storage_location = 'Fridge' ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT food_name, storage_location FROM food_expiration_monitoring WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-12-01' AND '2023-01-01' ORDER BY storage_location, expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM food_expiration_monitoring WHERE quantity < 5 OR storage_location = 'Freezer' ORDER BY quantity ASC, expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM FoodItems;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM FoodItems WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT item_name, expiration_date FROM FoodItems ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM FoodItems WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT a.alert_id, a.alert_type, f.item_name FROM Alerts a INNER JOIN FoodItems f ON a.item_id = f.item_id;
SELECT * FROM FoodItems WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM FoodItems WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, expiration_date FROM FoodItems WHERE quantity <= 5 AND expiration_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT item_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM FoodItems JOIN Alerts ON FoodItems.item_id = Alerts.item_id WHERE alert_type = 'Urgent';
SELECT item_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM FoodItems WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM FoodItems WHERE id = 1;
SELECT item_name, expiration_date FROM FoodItems WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Alerts ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT id, message FROM Notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Urgent';
SELECT id, recipient_email FROM Notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Reminder' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT item_name, expiration_date FROM FoodItems WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE alert_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT item_name, expiration_date, quantity FROM FoodItems WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY expiration_date LIMIT 8;
SELECT * FROM Notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Urgent' AND recipient_email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT item_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM FoodItems WHERE expiration_date < '2022-10-01' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM food_items WHERE item_name = 'Apple';
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM food_items WHERE category = 'Fruit' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM waste_minimization_strategies WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE creation_date < NOW();
SELECT notification_id, message, recipient_email FROM notifications WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM food_items WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT item_name, category FROM food_items WHERE quantity <= 5 ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, expiration_date, quantity FROM food_items WHERE category = 'Produce' LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE recipient_email = 'john.doe@email.com'
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-07-31'
SELECT * FROM FoodItems;
SELECT item_name, expiration_date FROM FoodItems WHERE expiration_date < CURDATE();
SELECT item_name, location_name FROM FoodItems JOIN FoodLocations ON FoodItems.item_id = FoodLocations.location_id;
SELECT notification_type, notification_message FROM Notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Critical';
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM Strategies ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM FoodItems;
SELECT item_name, expiration_date FROM FoodItems WHERE expiration_date > CURDATE();
SELECT item_name, expiration_date, location_name FROM FoodItems JOIN FoodLocations ON FoodItems.item_id = FoodLocations.location_id;
SELECT item_name, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM FoodItems JOIN ExpirationAlerts ON FoodItems.item_id = ExpirationAlerts.item_id WHERE alert_timestamp > NOW();

SELECT notification_type, notification_message, notification_timestamp FROM Notifications JOIN ExpirationAlerts ON Notifications.alert_id = ExpirationAlerts.alert_id WHERE notification_timestamp < NOW();
